name: Captor
description:
A prototype of a strategy game.

Take turns with another player moving units on a battlefield with the left mouse button. Press the 'T' key to end your turn.

Capture enemy units by placing your units next to them. Support your own units by placing their allies next to them.

Unfortunately, it's not that interesting a game. The core mechanic doesn't have a lot of depth to it without adding a lot of bells and whistles that I'm not sure would save it. I'm uploading this for the 1GAM challenge, but I'm unlikely to work on it any further.
